plot: Fox [Alex Kurnow] just can't seem to get it together. For the umpteenth time, he has let his basic urges ruin a date, this time with the alluring Dana [Ariana Brown]. As she storms off, a sudden flash in the night sky transports him aboard an alien ship! Strapped to a lab table, he meets the beautiful, but naive, abductor-in-training, Argon [Angeline Mirenda]. But when Fox sees this as a potential date opportunity, the tables are turned and hilarity ensues in a comedy that's out of this world!   Written by  Clayton Stone
title: Abduct Me!
